parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> 1.34

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns start and end positions for the given [[ropeCreate | rope]]. If command fails, empty array <tt>[]</tt> is returned.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[ropeEndPosition]] rope

</value></part><part><name>p1 </name>=<value> rope: [[Object]] - rope object
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - array in format [startPos, endPos], where:
* startPos: [[Array]] - rope start position in format [[PositionAGL]]
* endPos: [[Array]] - rope end position in format [[PositionAGL]]
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_ends = [[ropeEndPosition]] ([[ropes]] heli1 [[select]] 0);
_start = _ends [[select]] 0;
_end = _ends [[select]] 1;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[enableRopeAttach]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
